page.title: 02Going to work.
page.content:
There are few places providing work in the village, apart from the{shops, {garages}and{farms.}Quite a lot of people work in the{building industry, either with their own small businesses or with larger firms outside the area. There are plans in progress for an {industrial estate}of four small units to be built in St. Ive Road, Pensilva. Other people in the area have to travel to Liskeard to work in shops, offices and small factories. Some travel to Plymouth where they work in the{Dockyard}or are in the{Royal Navy.
Adrian Marc Phillips. Neil Alexander McCaig.
